description: Moebius transform of numbers of preferential arrangements.
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu[n/#]*(#-1)!*SeriesCoefficient[1/(2-Exp[x + O[x]^#]), #-1]&]; a[0]=0; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 20}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 03 2015, adapted from PARI *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
